title: Shahid Minar Miniature
shortDescription: A handmade miniature inspired by the Shaheed Minar with layered construction and hand-finished details.

title: Carved Wooden Frame
shortDescription: Decorative carved frame with a warm stain finish and sealed protective coat.

title: Clay Ornament Set
shortDescription: A small set of hand-shaped clay ornaments painted for a clean matte handmade look.
